item.title: It took 75 governors to elect a woman. Spanberger will soon be at Virginia's helm
item.description: Abigail Spanberger, a former CIA officer and three-term congresswoman, is breaking long-held traditions on inauguration day. She says she wants her swearing-in to showcase the state's modern vibrancy.

item.title: Canada agrees to cut tariff on Chinese EVs in return for lower tariffs on Canadian farm products
item.description: Breaking with the United States, Canada has agreed to cut its 100% tariff on Chinese electric cars in return for lower tariffs on Canadian farm products, Prime Minister Mark Carney said Friday.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: What Venezuela's oil could mean for the industry in Texas
item.description: There's renewed focus on the oil industry since the U.S. seized Venezuela's president. The benefits for Texas, which has many oil companies and the most refining capacity in the U.S., could be mixed.

item.title: China's trade surplus surges 20% to a record $1.2 trillion, even with Trump's tariffs
item.description: China's trade surplus surged to a record of almost $1.2 trillion in 2025, the government said Wednesday, as exports to other countries made up for slowing shipments to the U.S. under President Donald Trump's onslaught of higher tariffs.

item.title: FTC accuses AI search engine of 'rampant consumer deception'
item.description: Federal officials say a company that operates hundreds of landing pages for AI answers is running an operation that has duped thousands of users, who were unable to stop costly monthly charges.
